name: Fluffy pancakes
steps: Combine milk with vinegar in a medium bowl and set aside for 5 min to sour the milk.
Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt in a large mixing bowl. Whisk egg and butter into soured milk. Pour the flour mixture into the milk mixture and whisk until lumps are gone.

Heat a large skillet over medium heat, and coat it with cooking spray Pour 1/4 cupfuls of batter onto skillet and cook until form and the edges are dry, about 2-3 minutes. Flip with spatula and cook until browned on either side.
